meaningMnemonic: The <radical>rain</radical> is hated so much by <radical>wolverine</radical>s, so they always want to live in the <kanji>snow</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You ask the wolverine, "Why do you want this <kanji>snow</kanji> so bad?" He replies quickly: "Because the rain is <reading>yucky</reading>" (ゆき).
